players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is"
Bob: "Be careful, Alice. I might not be the mafioso as I've claimed, but the detective has likely figured out who it is. Keep an eye on Charlie and Diana, they could still be in the game."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I have identified Bob as the mafioso. Keep an eye on each other, as tonight's voting could be crucial."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
